districts.name: Barishal
districts.notes: Barishal district is known as the 'Venice of the East' due to its many rivers.

districts.name: Barguna
districts.notes: Barguna is known for its coastal economy and fishing.

districts.name: Bhola
districts.notes: Bhola is the largest island district in Bangladesh.

districts.name: Jhalokathi
districts.notes: Jhalokathi is famous for its floating guava markets.

districts.name: Patuakhali
districts.notes: Patuakhali is called the 'Gateway to Kuakata'.

districts.name: Pirojpur
districts.notes: Pirojpur is known for its betel leaf and beautiful river views.

districts.name: Chattogram
districts.notes: Chattogram is the major port city of Bangladesh.

districts.name: Cox's Bazar
districts.notes: Cox's Bazar has the longest natural sea beach in the world.

districts.name: Bandarban
districts.notes: Bandarban is known for its hills and natural beauty.

districts.name: Khagrachari
districts.notes: Khagrachari is known for its hills, forests and tribal culture.

districts.name: Rangamati
districts.notes: Rangamati is famous for its scenic hills and tribal culture.

districts.name: Noakhali
districts.notes: Noakhali is known for its coastal and island tourism.

districts.name: Feni
districts.notes: Feni is known for its natural beauty and vibrant culture.

districts.name: Lakshmipur
districts.notes: Lakshmipur is known for its agricultural products and natural parks.

districts.name: Brahmanbaria
districts.notes: Brahmanbaria is known for its rich cultural traditions.

districts.name: Cumilla
districts.notes: Cumilla is known for its archaeological sites and rich culture.

districts.name: Chandpur
districts.notes: Chandpur is famous for its river-based trade and fishing.

districts.name: Dhaka
districts.notes: Dhaka is the capital city and the economic, political center of Bangladesh.

districts.name: Gazipur
districts.notes: Gazipur is an industrial and garment manufacturing hub.

districts.name: Kishoreganj
districts.notes: Kishoreganj is known for its rich cultural traditions.

districts.name: Manikganj
districts.notes: Manikganj is known for its historical landmarks.

districts.name: Munshiganj
districts.notes: Munshiganj is famous for its riverine beauty and heritage.

districts.name: Narayanganj
districts.notes: Narayanganj is an industrial and commercial hub near Dhaka.

districts.name: Narsingdi
districts.notes: Narsingdi is known for its textile industry and cultural heritage.

districts.name: Rajbari
districts.notes: Rajbari is known for its historical landmarks and natural beauty.

districts.name: Shariatpur
districts.notes: Shariatpur is a riverine district known for agriculture and fishing.

districts.name: Tangail
districts.notes: Tangail is famous for Tangail Saree and rich cultural heritage.

districts.name: Faridpur
districts.notes: Faridpur is known for its historical significance and river trade.

districts.name: Gopalganj
districts.notes: Gopalganj is famous for being the birthplace of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman.

districts.name: Madaripur
districts.notes: Madaripur is known for its artistic and cultural heritage.

districts.name: Khulna
districts.notes: Khulna is the gateway to the Sundarbans and a major industrial hub.

districts.name: Bagerhat
districts.notes: Bagerhat is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for historical mosques.

districts.name: Satkhira
districts.notes: Satkhira is famous for its proximity to the Sundarbans and vibrant rural culture.

districts.name: Jessore
districts.notes: Jessore is the birthplace of Michael Madhusudan Dutt and a center for trade.

districts.name: Jhenaidah
districts.notes: Jhenaidah is an agricultural district known for its folk traditions.

districts.name: Magura
districts.notes: Magura is an agricultural district known for its rivers and handicrafts.

districts.name: Narail
districts.notes: Narail is known for its rich cultural heritage and folk music.

districts.name: Chuadanga
districts.notes: Chuadanga is a small border district known for agriculture and weaving.

districts.name: Kushtia
districts.notes: Kushtia is known as the birthplace of Lalon and for its musical heritage.

districts.name: Meherpur
districts.notes: Meherpur is historically important as the site of the Provisional Government of Bangladesh in 1971.

districts.name: Mymensingh
districts.notes: Mymensingh is known for its educational institutions and riverine beauty.

districts.name: Netrokona
districts.notes: Netrokona is famous for its haor wetlands and natural beauty.

districts.name: Sherpur
districts.notes: Sherpur is a hilly and riverine district known for its natural beauty.

districts.name: Jamalpur
districts.notes: Jamalpur is known for its agricultural economy.

districts.name: Rajshahi
districts.notes: Rajshahi is known as the Silk City of Bangladesh.

districts.name: Natore
districts.notes: Natore is known for its rich agricultural lands.

districts.name: Naogaon
districts.notes: Naogaon is a major agricultural district with rich cultural heritage.

districts.name: Nawabganj
districts.notes: Nawabganj is an agricultural district famous for handloom and natural wetlands.

districts.name: Pabna
districts.notes: Pabna is an educational and cultural hub in Rajshahi division.

districts.name: Bogura
districts.notes: Bogura is known for the Mahasthangarh archaeological site.

districts.name: Joypurhat
districts.notes: Joypurhat is known for its agriculture and cultural heritage.

districts.name: Sirajganj
districts.notes: Sirajganj is known for its handloom weaving and cultural heritage.

districts.name: Rangpur
districts.notes: Rangpur is famous for its agricultural produce and historic palaces.

districts.name: Kurigram
districts.notes: Kurigram is known for its wetlands and agricultural lands.

districts.name: Lalmonirhat
districts.notes: Lalmonirhat is known for its rivers and agricultural lands.

districts.name: Nilphamari
districts.notes: Nilphamari is known for tea gardens and rich cultural heritage.

districts.name: Gaibandha
districts.notes: Gaibandha is famous for rivers and agricultural activities.

districts.name: Thakurgaon
districts.notes: Thakurgaon is known for its natural beauty and cultural festivals.

districts.name: Panchagarh
districts.notes: Panchagarh is famous for its tea gardens and scenic beauty.

districts.name: Dinajpur
districts.notes: Dinajpur is famous for its historical sites and agriculture.

districts.name: Sylhet
districts.notes: Sylhet is known for tea gardens, natural beauty, and vibrant culture.

districts.name: Moulvibazar
districts.notes: Moulvibazar is famous for its tea gardens and cultural heritage.

districts.name: Habiganj
districts.notes: Habiganj is known for its tea gardens and natural reserves.

districts.name: Sunamganj
districts.notes: Sunamganj is renowned for its haor wetlands and biodiversity.
